DOC.brief_summary: The purpose multicenter , double-blind , placebo-controlled study evaluate efficacy safety lenalidomide treatment painful lumbar radiculopathy .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Lenalidomide Treatment Painful Lumbar Radiculopathy
DOC.detailed_description: Study Duration : Pre-randomization Phase : 14 day ; Treatment Phase : 12 week ; Extension Phase : Ongoing ; Total Study Duration : Up 14 week + duration extension phase For subject , study consist three phase : Pre-randomization phase ( 14 day ) , Treatment Phase ( 12 week ) extension phase subject opportunity receive lenalidomide treatment long benefit derive drug . Subjects complete 12 week treatment phase may eligible initiate ( subject randomize receive placebo treatment phase ) continue receive lenalidomide therapy ( subject randomize receive lenalidomide treatment phase ) extension phase . Subjects may continue extension phase long benefit derive drug .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year great time signing informed consent form Clinical diagnosis painful radiculopathy base presence pain distribution sciatic nerve L4 , L5 S1 dermatome . The pain must primarily lower leg radiate ankle foot . History painful radiculopathy involve one distal low extremity great equal 6 month MRI CT scan within past 2 year recent symptom change Positive straight leg raising ( SLR ) test index ipsilateral leg ( pain radiate knee elevation < 60 degree ) . In presence bilateral leg pain , leg severe pain designated index leg . Screening ( Visit 1 ) : Radiculopathy PINRS score must least 5 11point ( 010 ) PINRS Randomization ( Visit 2 ) : Average radiculopathy PINRS score randomization purpose base AM PM assessment make 7 day prior randomization : 1 . At least eight radiculopathy PINRS score 7day period require 2 . Average radiculopathy PINRS score period must least 5 11point ( 010 ) PINRS . Stable dos tricyclic antidepressant , AEDs , mexiletine hydrochloride , dextromethorphan , capsaicin , NSAIDs , opioids medication ( include prn radiculopathy medication usage ) could affect symptom painful radiculopathy least 28 day prior randomization ( Visit 2 ) . Negative drug abuse screen ( except drug know prescribed radiculopathy ) . Women childbearing potential ( WCBP ) must agree practice complete abstinence heterosexual intercourse use two method contraception begin 4 week prior start study drug ( Day 1 ) study drug ( include dose interruption ) 4 week last dose study drug . The two method contraception must include one highly effective method ( i.e . intrauterine device , hormonal [ birth control pill , injection , implant use conjunction lowdose ( 81 mg/day ) aspirin regimen ] , tubal ligation , partner 's vasectomy ) one additional effective ( barrier ) method ( i.e . latex condom , diaphragm , cervical cap ) . If hormonal method ( birth control pill , injection implant ) IUD medically possible subject , two barrier method acceptable . Women childbearing potential ( WCBP ) must two negative pregnancy test ( sensitivity least 50 mlU/mL ) prior start study drug treatment . The first test perform within 1014 day second within 24 hour start study drug . Once treatment start , recommend subject weekly pregnancy test first 4 week treatment . Thereafter , subject required pregnancy test every 4 week females regular menstrual cycle every 2 week females irregular cycle . Males ( include vasectomy ) must use barrier contraception ( latex condom ) engage reproductive sexual activity WCBP study drug 4 week last dose study drug . Pain localize low back sit great component subject 's total pain problem low leg foot pain Ankle foot problem , could interfere assessment radiculopathy pain Unstable lumbar spinal segment Evidence acute operable lesion tumor base CTscan MRI result Current sign symptom severe , progressive uncontrolled renal , hepatic , hematological , endocrine , pulmonary , cardiac neurological disease Any medical condition , include presence laboratory abnormality , place subject unacceptable risk he/she participate study confounds ability interpret data study Presence clinically significant psychiatric diagnosis ( e ) would impair reliable study participation History deep vein thrombosis ( DVT ) stroke past 5 year History low back lumbar spinal surgery Documented metabolic toxic peripheral neuropathy Any serious medical condition , laboratory abnormality , psychiatric illness would prevent subject understand signing informed consent form White blood cell count ( WBC ) < 3.5 x 10/L Visit 1 Bilirubin , alanine transaminase ( ALT ) , aspartate transaminase ( AST ) alkaline phosphatase value two time upper limit normal range Visit 1 Abnormal T3 , T4 TSH test value ( ) Visit 1 ( An abnormal TSH level presence normal T3 T4 level acceptable ) . More 6 epidural steroid injection within 12 month prior randomization ( Visit 2 ) . Use epidural steroid injection within 28 day randomization Concurrent use spinal cord stimulator intrathecal drug infusion device Limited duration ( plan termination either Prerandomization Treatment Phases ) nondrug therapy ( include physical therapy , acupuncture chiropractic treatment ) Prerandomization Treatment Phases study . Subjects may continue home exercise , stable part subject 's treatment regimen least 28 day prior randomization . Use concomitant medication , could increase risk develop DVT , except steroidbased contraceptive ( oral , injectable , implantable ) hormone replacement therapy use conjunction lowdose ( 81 mg/day ) aspirin regimen Use oral corticosteroid ( except asthma inhaler Medrol Dosepak ) within 28 day prior randomization Concurrent use thalidomide Prior development allergic reaction/hypersensitivity , moderate severe rash , desquamation take thalidomide . Prior treatment lenalidomide Use experimental drug therapy within 28 day start Treatment Phase Current pregnancy lactation History poor compliance inability comply medical regimen study requirement Inability use electronic diary Active litigation ( i.e . pending litigation pending proceeding ) , compensation disability issue relate painful radiculopathy ( Subjects whose case settle finally decide eligible )
